description:
Saber, a Saber-class Servant summoned in the "True and False Holy Grail Wars" of Fate/strange Fake.
[spoiler="True name and Master"]His true name is Richard I, also known as Richard the Lionheart. He is the "True" Saber-class Servant summoned by http://anidb.net/character/126008 [Ayaka Sajou].[/spoiler]
name: Saber
